story: You find yourself in a dimly lit room filled with old machinery and scattered tools. The air is thick with the smell of grease and ozone. In the center of the room stands an ancient-looking 3D printer, its metal frame covered in dust and cobwebs. What do you do?

actions.action: Attempt to interact with the 3D printer
actions.good: The 3D printer whirs to life, and a small compartment opens, revealing a stash of valuable items. You take the loot.
actions.bad: Your attempt to interact with the 3D printer triggers an electrical shock. You take damage but manage to escape.

actions.action: Search for a manual or instructions on how to use the 3D printer
actions.good: You find a hidden compartment containing a detailed manual and a set of specialized tools. With these, you successfully assemble a new component from the 3D printer.
actions.bad: Your search for a manual leads you to discover that the room has been compromised. You take damage as the area begins to fill with noxious gas.

actions.action: Leave the room and explore other areas of the gang stronghold
actions.good: You successfully escape the room without triggering any alarms, finding new paths and opportunities to acquire valuable items.
actions.bad: As you leave the room, you accidentally trigger a hidden sensor. You take damage from an automatic takedown sequence initiated by the stronghold's security systems.
